item.description:
Anyone up for a last minute pre-holiday pre-chaos brunch?

The Living Room on the water front in Boston serves up Saturday brunch with steel drums playing live in the background (12pm - 2pm). Lets drift off to a tropical place, before we head back out in the cold to finish up our Christmas shopping (Faneuil Hall is walking distance).

The Living Room is walking distance from Faneuil Hall, Aquarium, North End, and Long Warf. Perfect for shopping after brunch.

Lets meet at 1145am. Creative cocktails are served... some with very festive names "Grinch"

The menu is diverse and fairly reasonably priced

Check out the menu:

http://thelivingroomb...
item.name: Brunch and Steel Drums
